thread.title: You will definitely LOL at Adele's alleged concert transportation trick
thread.title_full: You will definitely LOL at Adele's alleged concert transportation trick

author: Johnny Lieu
title: You will definitely LOL at Adele's alleged concert transportation trick
text:
If you've been lucky enough to attend one of Adele's concerts in Australia, you'll notice that in many cases, the stage is in the centre of a sports stadium.
With no underground access in the middle of the field, how the hell does she get to the stage, in order to magically pop out at the beginning of the show?
SEE ALSO: Adele generously grants Elmo's plea to hang out in Australia
According to The Sun , Adele has been using a humble box to transport herself â€” as in one of those giant touring cases which usually house equipment.
"Adele sits in the box for several minutes as she is taken from her dressing room right to the centre of the crowd," an unnamed source told the outlet.
â€œMost of her fans are already seated and just presume itâ€™s a piece of kit they are moving but some have been told by staff at venues that actually it's their idol and a woman worth Â£85million sitting in a pretty small box a few feet from them."
new season of Adele Rolling in the Box pic.twitter.com/WHX3zvMvdK
â€” enfant bizarre . (@AAdelequeen) March 1, 2017
It's certainly an admirably low-tech solution, if true.
So.... I saw @Adele 's box! ðŸ˜‰ #AdeleSydney #adelelive2017 #adele pic.twitter.com/PT6660VZxg
â€” Leisa Johns (@leisa_johns) March 12, 2017
Australian tour promoter for Adele, Live Nation, have refused to comment on the mysterious box and the contents therein. So while we may never find out the truth regarding the box, we'll take solace in the fact that Elmo and Adele are now besties. Too cute.
Elmo's dreams have come true! Elmo loves you, Miss @adele ! #adelmo pic.twitter.com/0TmkCJxJRE
â€” Elmo (@elmo) March 10, 2017
